contexts.context: The Ginko leaves which are found along the <mark>banks</mark> of rivers and lakes in Hammerfell are most inconspicuous, only...
.... Alof's farm nearby has a small dock on the north <mark>bank</mark> of Lake Amaya. This is the only dock nearby which...
...mana. And also must the Magicka Fountains be damped and <mark>banked</mark>, sanctioning their engendering only to the reconsecration of essential arcane...
